122.content:
Kang and Kodos hovered far above Earth, formulating a dastardly yet another plot to take over the world. Kodos scratched his helmet with a tentacle and frowned his single eye, trying to think of something.

"What can we do, Kang?" Kodos asked. "Taking over Springfield and the world is just so much work."

Kang idly flipped on a video screen, showing the town of Springfield far below the space ship. Zooming in, the aliens viewed the homes and families of the town, examining small details in search of inspiration to take over the city in the easiest possible manner. Kodos' eye fell on one backyard in particular, where a spikey-haired human male was stomping gleefully on an anthill as his father dashed out from the back door and began to run towards him.

"Kang, have you completed your work on the Size Amplification Ray?" Kodos asked.

"Yes. Why?"

"I have the perfect idea," Kodos continued pointing at the boy, who was now sitting on the anthill and arguing with his father. "We can make him into a giant capable of doing the dirty work for us. Then we go in and preside over the weakened humans."

"Brilliant! We shall make our move tonight!"

***

That evening, the aliens flew down to Springfield. Cloaking their ship, they hovered over the house of the boy and searched for the location of their target. Once Kodos had locked onto the boy, they hastily beamed him aboard.

One moment, Bart Simpson was sitting in the bath tub, the next he was in a strange high-tech environment. Dropping the bar of soap he'd been holding and standing up, Bart looked around in disbelief as a jet of warm air dried off his naked body.

"Where am I?" he wondered aloud as a door at the end of the futuristic room he was in slid open. Walking through the door, Bart found himself greeted by two slimey green aliens with severe salivary problems.

"What have you done?" Bart asked accusingly, crossing his arms over his bare chest and tapping a toe.

"Greetings, Earthling. We are named Kang and Kodos," Kang introduced the pair.

"We have beamed you aboard our ship with a humble request and... business proposition," Kodos continued.

"Oh, and what is that?"

"We are going to conquer your puny planet and we want your help," Kodos replied.

"How could I do that?" Bart asked.

"We have in our possession a Size Amplification Ray. It is possible for us to grow you to enormous heights. Thus enlarged, you would be able to destroy Springfield or any other Earth-city with ease. All we ask is that you leave some survivors for us to rule over."

How does Bart respond?

"Patience, Earthling," Kodos replied. "Stand in that green circle."

Bart followed Kodos' instructions and grinned as a large gun-contraption was aimed at him. There was a flash of blinding violet light.

The interior of the space ship had been replaced by a starry night scene. Bart looked around in amusement. He was, indeed, gigantic. Downright colossal. The thousand-foot-tall Bart was standing in the forest somewhere, his naked body towering over the ankle-high trees.

Bart looked over at the pocket-sized (if he had any pockets) space ship hovering a short distance away. Before the aliens had a chance to react, Bart swiped the ship out of the sky. Smashing it open like a peanut, Bart deposited the unlucky pair on his palm.

"Thanks, guys!" Bart cackled.

Extending his tongue, Bart leaned in to lick the Kang and Kodos off his palm. They fired at the descending slab of muscle in desperation, but it only tickled the gigantic boy. Giggling, Bart licked them up and swallowed them whole. Letting out a satisfied belch, Bart looked around gleefully.

125331.content:
Ned pulled down the street after a long day at the Leftorium. He'd had another tiresome day and wished he hadn't been bothered by the usual pack of hecklers and troublemakers. Pulling into the parking lot of the First Church of Springfield, Ned entered the building and sat down in one of the front pews.

He the only person in the building, as even Reverend Lovejoy was elsewhere, running errands. Ned closed his eyes and knealed before the altar, seeking solace from the Almighty.

"Oh, Heavenly Father," Ned began "Please help me to forgive my fellow man and understand their ridicule."

"I CAN NOT HELP YOU WITH THAT, NEDWARD FLANDERS," boomed a powerful voice.

Ned opened his eyes and looked around in shock. He was bathed suddenly in a heavenly light that seemed to stream from everywhere.

"Wh-who is that?" Ned called out.

"I AM THE LORD YOUR GOD, NEDWARD," the voice boomed. "I CAN NOT NOT HELP YOU FORGIVE YOUR FELLOW MAN BECAUSE I DO NOT SEE ANYTHING THAT IS POSSIBLE TO CURE IT. SPRINGFIELD HAS BECOME A CESS-PIT OF SIN. I MUST PURGE THIS SIN FROM THE FACE OF THE EARTH!"

"A flood, Lord?" Ned quavered. "Well, gosh, I thought You had promised not to do that."

"OH, NOT A FLOOD, NEDWARD. I SEE YOU AS THE ONLY FAITHFUL MAN IN THIS PITIFUL CITY. I WANT YOU TO BECOME MY AGENT. MY ANGEL OF DEATH, IF YOU WILL. WHAT SAY YOU TO THIS CHARGE?"

"Well, good golly gosh. I guess I can't refuse the Almighty," Ned said.

"YOU HAVE CHOSEN WELL. NOW BRACE YOURSELF. AND MAKE SURE NOT TO LEAVE A SINGLE BUILDING UNTOUCHED."

Ned barely had time to wonder what the Lord meant by his final comment before a flood of energy coursed through his body. Stunned, Ned gasped as he felt himself begin to grow. His clothes began to feel tight and finally shredded to scraps, falling to the floor. Ned's glasses smashed, but he found that they weren't really necessary anymore. Ned was soon pressed against the roof of the church, but didn't stop growing. A shocked Ned smashed through the top of the First Church. By the time his growth stopped, the church was only shin-high to the 250-foot Ned.

What does Ned do?

"Yes, I know exactly where Millhouse is" Lisa remarked "would you like to join him?"

Lisa gave a wicked little grin then picked up the shrink way.

"Ok Bart" she said as she aimed it at him and fired the device "here goes."

She watched as the boy who was once her big brother started to shrink before her eyes. Never again would he be taller than her. As he shrunk she knew that the tables had now turned. Soon he would bigger than one of her Milibu Stacey dolls and that of course suited her purposes just fine.

Bart of course had no idea what was really happening, and what it now meant for him. He saw the room and his sister seeming to expand before his eyes and he had no idea why. The thought that he was shrinking didn't occur to him. People didn't just shrink, that was absurd. "What's going on Lise?" he enquired.

The reducing process hadn't taken long. In just a few seconds he was also no more than four inches tall. He watched in amazement as Lisa bent down and picked him up.

"What's going on Bart is that I have just shrunk you" she purred "the process is irreversible which means that for the rest of your life you will be no bigger than one of my Malibu Stacey dolls. Millhouse is in my pocket by the way, and you told me you wanted to join him. I have now granted your request. From now on Bart, you and your miniature friend are the property of your younger sister, toys for her to use however she wants. For the rest of your lives you are simply MINE!

15521112112112.content:
Lisa decided that simply holding Bart and Millhouse prisoner in her pocket would be no fun at all so she chooses to do something else with them. Still holding Bart in her hand she wanders over to her dressing table Suddenly she felt completely free and more content than she had ever imagined she would. Her irritating older brother, the bane of her life up until that point was no longer of any significance to her other than as a plaything that she could and would use for her own amusement for ever. He was her toy, her plaything, her slave, her property. From now on he would belong, be owned by her and used for her own amusement.

This arrangement of course suited her perfectly. She now had him exactly where she knew he belonged. She wondered if fate itself had delivered the shrink ray into her hands, if she was destined to one day turn her older brother into her own tiny boy-toy. She only hoped that it might have happened sooner so she could have been spared 8 years of having to deal with a bratty older brother. Up until now Lisa had thought of him as a pain but that had changed the moment she had fired the gun. Now that he was simply 'hers' her mind was filled with a blissful euthoria. Surely heaven itself could feel no better than the way her life had now turned.

Did Millhouse also deserve this fate though? She took a moment to consider this before coming to the conclusion that he probably did. That boy had been irritating too but in a different way. For as long as she could remember he had been trying to force he to go out with him. He wouldn't take no for an answer no matter how many times she turned him down. He wouldn't leave her alone and she was getting more than a little sick of him. She was sure that if she hadn't shrunk him she might have decided to beat him to a pulp in order to convince him to leave her alone. The idea had even appealed to her on more than one occasion. This position was even more appealing to her now though. He had wanted to get closer to her than she liked and now he was closer than he would ever want but she doubted that this was what he had in mind. Too bad, he could share her brother's fate and of course she could still beat him whenever she wanted.

Now of course her life lay before her, her brother and his infantile friend spending the rest of their lives as her living dolls neither of them were in any position to ever hold her back and stop her from realising her potential. Her mother of course would support her all the way. The only other potential obstacle was her stupid father. If he got in the way though she could get by with 3 toys in her collection just as easily as she did with two. Yes, from now on life would be sweet but what to do with the 2 tiny boys she was currently carrying.

Now that Lisa had her brother and his annoying friend exactly where she wanted them (squashed firmly beneath her backside) it occurred to her that she didn't really need to concern herself with either of them. As long as she continued to sit there they would both remain buried beneath her butt cheeks. She was relaxed, she was content and she was delighted with the way that her life had now changed for the better but she needed something to do other than simply sit there and enjoy the moment. The warm glow that now permeated her body and the welcome and increasingly familiar feeling of the two older boys buried beneath her backside brought on a sense of calm serenity that she had never known before but no matter how blissful her current situation was she knew she still needed to do something to keep her mind occupied. The babysitting of Bart and Millhouse had been arranged. It needed no cosncous thought or effort on her part and this left her free to pursue other tasks. As long as she remained seated at her dressing table the babysitting would tend to itself.

She looked around for something to do, some activity to keep herself occupied. She saw her saxophone standing beside her dressing table within easy each and she was about to pick it up to start playing when she caught sight of the English essay that Miss Hoover had set for her. She had to write a story of over 2500 words in length but the subject of the story was left open. It could be anything she wanted it to be. Lisa of course wasn't somebody who shied away from school work. She enjoyed working hard and achieving top marks in her assignments. Too often though her old brother had found ways to disrupt her or to sabotage her work. She was certain that from now on he would be in no position to prevent her from achieving her academic targets.

The more she thought about it, the more that English assignment seemed like the perfect choice. It would certainly help her to use her imagination whilst providing her with the perfect excuse to keep her butt firmly planted upon the two tiny boys beneath her. She picked up a pen, opened her exercise book and considered what she was going to write about. It took her only a moment to come up with the ideal subject matter. She would write a story about a girl who finds a means to shrink other people, then uses her new power to avenge herself upon all the bullies and people who had wronged her throughout her life. Not only would this allow her to draw upon personal experiences and fantasies, it would also fire her imagination and encourage her to think up new and even more imaginative uses for the two tiny boys she was currently sitting upon.

Grinning from ear to ear she put pen to paper and started writing. It took no time at all before the ideas began to flow and she had started to sketch in a rough plan for her story. As she started to write she quickly came to the conclusion that 2500 words would not be nearly enough space for her to write her full story, she would surely need at least three times that number. It was a minimum after all though, if she wanted to write more then there was nothing to stop her. As the words flowed freeliy from her increasingly active pen, Lisa seemed to lose all track of time. The world outside her room did not intrude upon her awareness at all. Aside from the soft scribblings of her pen on the paper there was utter silence. Even the television downstairs seemed to be giving her a break, as she couldn't hear any sound from it.

Despite the fact that it seemed to be bypassing her bedroom though, time continued unabated. On the pages before her the story was taking shape and starting to develop some particularly interesting sounding plot twists.Bart and Millhouse's miniature bodies remained imprisioned beneath her butt and with each passing second the possibility of parole became more and more remote. A thought occurred to her which she quickly committed to the paper. She even toyed with the prospect of wearing the unfortunate boy as part of a brand new diamond ring. Lisa even considered the idea herself but surely that was just some form of wild fantasy wasn't it? Still, she wouldn't say no to the prospect of owning a brand new sparkler.

Time continued to move on for Bart and Millhouse too but they were barely aware of it. From their pitch black world buried deep under Lisa's backside they could hear nothing at all. Their world was now one of sensation alone: the warmth, the feeling, the intense pressure and the delicate feminine aroma of the girl who seemed largely unware of the fact that she was using both of them as her seat cushion. They could not hear the motion of Lisa's pen as that was too faint and too distant to register on their senses. One moment seemed to fade into the next for both of them, each second exactly the same as the one that had just passed. Nothing changed, nothing happened They were lost in a cycle of endless now with with the passage of seconds seeming to stretch on into infinity. Their lives before Lisa shrunk them and sat on them started to feel like a distant memory, then a dream, a legend. The more Lisa sat on them the more they became convinced that she had always done so and always will continue to do so.

Lisa too lost track of how long she had been sitting on Bart and Millhouse. At times when she became particularly engrossed in her writing she seemed to forget all about them, although she was surely aware on a subconscious level that the two boys were still incarcerated beneath her - detained at her own pleasure and used for the same purpose and allowing her mind to conceive of even more incredible adventures for the characters in her story. Now and again she would allow her bare legs to swing gently backwards and forwards gently. Between her red dress and her socks her skin was exposed, uncovered. Her hips and thighs remained static and motionless and the two boys beneath her were entirely hidden from view under her backside. Her hand moved rapidly along the page, her pen sketching out scenarios and possibilities she felt she really should try on her own shrunken boy-toys sometime and the more she wrote the more she became engrossed in her writing.

As time passed seconds faded into each other and became minutes, and those too passed into hours. The day wore on around her and yet this one girl sat seemingly alone at her dressing table developing what was rapidly becoming the longest written work she had ever committed to paper. Concealed from the eyes of any who might observe her working on this assignment though she was far from alone. Every instant that she sat there writing her story her entire bodyweight was bearing down relentlessly on the tiny bodies of her older brother and his best friend concealed beneath her butt cheeks as she secretly sat upon both of them.

155211121121121212.content:
Time continued its stately march and Lisa still paid no attention whatsoever to the shrunken forms of Bart and Milllhouse buired beneath her backside. She had been sitting on them for so long that it was no longer news, no longer relevant or significant. It was a trivial matter, easily overlooked. She no longer had to think about it and for the longest time, so long that she could not even recall when it began she had been sat at her dressing table working on her school assignment. It was only when she re-read a paragraph that she had just written she allowed the concept of shrunken boys to filter through her mind. At that point she was hit by the sudden realisation that there were two such little ones trapped under her right now - Bart and his irritating friend Millhouse.

It might be assumed that she would have been shocked to recall that sudden piece of information, but for some reason she was not. There was no clock in her room and no way for her to be sure how long she had been sitting on them for but the idea that the two of them may have spent the next several hourse with no purpose other than to serve as her seat cushion was one that appealed to her sense of justice, morality and social positioning. She certainly had no intention of relieving of them of the role to which they seemed ideally suited.

For so long Bart and others liked him had claimed that boys were superior to girls, that females were weak willed and weak brained. Lisa knew for certain that she was intellectually stronger than Bart Now it seemed she was greater than him in every conceivable way - not mearly in size but in status and power too. For longer than she could recall she had been keeping her brother in thrall as her servant, her prisoner, her toy. She had sat on him simply because she wanted too and there was nothing he could do about it. There was no way that he could deny that she was his superior now. She own him, Millhouse too. As far as they were concerned she was their goddess.

That word brought another memory to her mind. She recalled that miniature civilisation she had once created. Didn't those little people worship her, wasn't she their deity? Bart had scoffed at the idea and tried to destroy her civilisation, but now she knew he was going to take their place. He was now the shrunken supplicant and she held all of the power.The irony of fate was not lost on one as bright as Lisa. She grinned a wicked little grin of pure delight when she considered the forms of worship that she would force Bart to endure. His would be a religious conversion, a test of faith like none other in recorded history and she was going to love every moment of their ecclesiastical awakening.

Just at that moment though, Lisa was awoken from her silent musing by a knock on the door. Knowing that Bart and Millhouse could not be seen at the moment, Lisa turned in her chair and looked towards her bedroom door. "Yes?" she enquired.

The door opened and Marge walked into the room. "Sorry to disturb you Lisa" she enquired in a worried frown "you haven't seen Bart anywhere have you? He has been missing for hours."

Lisa forced her expression into that of a worried frown before answering honestly "no, mum. He did come in here but he must have vanished. I haven''t seen him since before I started on my school assignment." All of this was completely true, she was just neglecting to mention that Bart was now only 4 inches tall and buried under one of her butt cheeks.

"Ok, Well I am going to head out in the car and go look for him, and I want you to come too. You know the places he likes to hang out."

"Very well mum" she responded, a little miffed that she wasn't able to complete her homework assignment "give me a few minutes to sort myself out and I'll see you downstairs... ok?"

"ok Lisa, don't take long"

With that Marge wandered outside the room and closed the doors, Lisa could hear the sound of her descending the stairs.

It was with some reluctance that Lisa forced the chair back from the dressing table and stood up. Her boys had provided her with a particularly comfortable seat and she really didn't feel like abandoning it just yet. She looked down at the chair to see what state Bart and Millhouse were in now.

A weight which would have no real effect upon the object at its original size could have a devastating effect one it has been shrunk. If the button did what she hoped it would though then this apparent oversight would be an amusing quirk not a tragedy, and one that could be repeated any time she felt like it. She read on.

When the user aims the device at the flattened target and presses the re-inflate button that the object or person who had been flattened will be re-inflated, restoring them to the shape they were before they were squished. It should be pointed out that the individual will not be regrown. They will retain their shrunken form but their body shape will be restored, the dimension they lost when they were flattened will be returned to them. From the moment the gun is fired the re-shaping takes approximately 30 seconds to complete."
